statements: DELETE FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE heart_rate > 90 AND blood_pressure = '120/80';
DELETE FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND blood_pressure = '120/80';
DELETE FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE patient_id = 101 AND timestamp = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE patient_id = 100 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PatientHealthMetrics WHERE patient_id = 1234 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TreatmentHistory WHERE treatment_date < '2021-12-01' AND patient_id = 5678;
DELETE FROM health_metrics WHERE heart_rate > 100 AND temperature < 98.6;
DELETE FROM treatments WHERE treatment_name = 'Surgery' AND physician_name = 'Dr. Smith';
